name: Reddit Toolbox Dark Mode
description: A dark theme for the reddit extension 'toolbox' that uses the redesign night mode colors.
additional_info:
Get toolbox here: https://www.reddit.com/r/toolbox/wiki/get

1.0 - 17/03/2019 - initial version

1.1 - 17/03/2019 - added dark mode to personal notes

1.2 - 14/06/2019 - 
        Toolbox now supports night mode in old.reddit. this will now only support the redesign on new.reddit and www.reddit
        
        - Fixed 'open in old reddit button
        - Fixed context menu buttons
        - Fixed scroll bars
